about_the_game:
Exposed Office Simulator is an office touching game.

The names of the main character and office worker can be changed.
Please note that there are restraints such as shackles, shackles and shackles, but there are no descriptions of the girls suffering from force or coercion.
The game can be cleared by achieving a score, and you will move on to the next day.

Over the course of seven days, exposure increases.

Touching increases your score.
There are different ways of touching, such as 'rubbing', 'playing with' and 'popping'.
The amount by which your score increases depends on the way you touch. The higher the increase, the faster the embarrassment meter rises, and when the meter reaches its maximum, the game is over, but there is no penalty.
There is also a time limit of about 8 minutes because the situation is that you are touching during lunch break, but even if you go over, you will only be returned to the title screen and there is no penalty.

There is also a time limit of about eight minutes because the situation is that you are touching someone during lunch break, but even if you go over, you will only be returned to the title screen and there will be no penalty.

Your score will automatically increase by any method other than holding down the mouse.
The interval between score increases varies depending on your mood. (1-5 seconds)
Items such as eye masks, shackles and shackles can be purchased and used to increase the increase.

Items can be purchased in the shop in exchange for scores.

As well as earning scores just by rubbing, you can also earn scores in an in-game game called KICK ASS ZOMBI WOMEN.
This is a simple side-scrolling, mouse-click to defeat Zombie Woman in a mini-game that takes roughly two minutes per play.
It was created for relaxation and for those who are tired of rubbing.

There are three endings.
You can choose one by buying shackles, manacles, shackles and anal beads from the shop.
The story (?) of the end of the continued touching. The story is. You can also touch here.

The English translation is a machine translation.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are depictions of women being stripped naked and their breasts and genitals being touched.
There are scenes where women are restrained with chains, but this is a depiction of mild SM play. There are no depictions of violence against women in restraints.
However, there is consensual behaviour in relation to sexual activity.
